webDisplayData.title: Social Commerce Market Intelligence
webDisplayData.summary: The Social Commerce market encompasses commerce functionality integrated directly into social media platforms, enabling creators and brands to sell products without leaving the social environment. This market includes TikTok Shop, Instagram Shopping, Facebook Shops, Pinterest Shopping, and emerging platforms that blend content creation with direct commerce.
